phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
The Star Festival, held in the royal capital, had begun.
to acknowledge the Magic Knights Squads' achievements
and announce who had received the most stars from the Wizard King that year.
Asta had invited Kahono and Kiato from the Underwater Temple to the festival
and used the Queen of Witches' secret witch spells
to heal Kahono's injured throat and Kiato's injured leg.
Asta and the others enjoyed the festival, but...
What does Noelle mean to you?
What does she mean to me?
I like Noelle quite a bit.
Where the heck did that come from?!
Asta ended up stumbling upon Yami and Captain Jack the Ripper
of the Green Praying Mantises facing off in a rather heated situation.
Behold the song and dance of the Underwater Temple!
And that boy dances so elegantly.
Kahono can sing again, and Kiato can dance again.
Do not you think so, Stupidsta?
How dare he fly off somewhere?
Want to take a shot or two, miss?
Would you like to try one, miss?
I guess common food is okay.
This is not bad at all.
Anyway, I wonder where Stupidsta flew off to.
Mana seems to be concentrating over there...
Everyone, come try out Captain Yami's yummyI mean, Yami grilled squid!
Jack's meat dishes are the best!
You only need one bite to feel satisfied!
Your mouth cannot help but go bah-ha, bah-ha, bah-ha!
You mean they will be going aph, aph, aphew!
Your heart and stomach will feel phat and content!
If you do not get us some customers, I will kill you.
Mister, how about a squidtastic squid?
If you do not get me more customers, I am going to slice you up.
I promise he is not scary, everyone!
They will not even look at me.
The unpopular captain of the Black Bulls
and our captain are right next to each other.
There is no way anyone's going to buy from us.
I promise it is not poisoned!
I was wondering why mana was concentrating over here.
Guess you are here, too, Bah-ha.
Young lady from the Black Bulls...
My name is not Bah-ha, it is Sekke.
So, what are you and Bah... er, Sekke, doing, Asta?
I have wanted to settle the score with you for a long time.
Your food stall and my food stall...
Let us see who sells the most!
There is no way I am going to lose!
If you lose, I will flay you alive!
Bring it on, you giant string bean!
If you lose, I will make you wipe my ass!
I are not going to lose!
That is why we got roped into bringing customers in.
But neither stall has sold anything.
How about some grilled purple snakes I just caught over there?
Stop getting distracted by other stalls.
I risked my life catching them in a storm off the coast of Raquey,
using my years of fishing experience!
They are the finest you can get!
Do not you dare compare them to some snakes!
If I lose to Jack, it will be all your fault.
They were caught fresh of the coast of Raquey!
They are the finest you can get!
They are delicious, just like the tatoes from Hage Village!
What are you trying to do?
So it is your fault that I have not sold a single one yet!
We do not have time to wait and see who can get better sales.
I was just thinking the same thing.
Guess we need to step it up a notch!
If I actually get serious, you are going to die.
We are going to end up causing a disturbance here.
We will not bother anyone here.
I am on another level today...
And I will slice you in half, just like that grilled squid!
Why did I have to come, too?
Captain Jack can slice a giant mountain in bah-half!
You may be the Captain of the Black Bulls, but you are no match for Captain Jack!
What is got Bah-ha so worked up?
That festival had the girls so laid-back that my flirting almost worked.
Yami and Jack having a no-holds-barred battle...
I wonder what kind of powerful spells I will see.
You ready for this, Jack the Ripper?
Yami Sukehiro, my blades are tingling!
They cannot wait to slice and dice you!
Last time, you were almost dead, so slicing you up would not have been worth it.
You let those Eye of the Midnight Sun bastards beat the shit out of you!
I was only acting like they beat the shit out of me.
I was going to turn things around right when you guys showed up.
Looks like you are getting worked up, Yami.
You will actually be worth slicing up today!
Let us see who is going to be slicing up who!
Well, I see they are as terrifying as ever.
I can feel their electrifying ki all the way over here!
Why are all the Magic Knights Squad Captains so weird?
Let us see what kind of battle unfolds!
Again, why are you so worked up?
Dark Magic: Dark Cloaked Black Blade!
Blade can draw out the enemy's spell!
So that is how he avoided that attack.
You are so awesome, Captain Yami!
Yami and Jack, both of your spells are amazing!
I guess I will start this next round.
I will show you an extra-special spell.
I awakened a new spell during the mission to the Underwater Temple.
My own talent scares me sometimes.
He is going to use that on Captain Jack?
Uh, Finral, should not we be stopping Captain Yami now?
This is dangerous, even for Captain Jack.
What if something happens to one of the Magic Knights Squad Captains?
What do you expect me to do?
If one of them goes down, the other's going to be held responsible.
And if that happens, the forces protecting the Clover Kingdom will be weakened!
Then what do you think will happen?
The Eye of the Midnight Sun or the Diamond Kingdom might attack!
If you do not stop them now, it will be all your fault!
Seriously, who the hell are you?
What does that have to do with anything right now?!
But I probably should try to stop them.
Either of them getting defeated would be bad news.
If he actually uses Dimension Slash in here,
who knows if the rest of this cave will even hold up?
Since I have the most seniority here, I need to stop them!
I would have loved to have seen Dimension Slash,
but as you mentioned, if something were to happen to any of the Magic Knights Captains,
we would be at a disadvantage.
Not to mention, this cave would probably collapse from the impact.
I will just have to look forward to seeing Dimension Slash later.
Where are you slacking off now?!
Please stop fooling around and hurry back!
It is time for the meeting concerning the Star Festival's
announcement of how many stars each squad has earned!
Do not Oh, is it? me!
The king is waiting for you, too!
You are always so angry, Marx.
Your blood pressure's going to go sky-high.
I am going to head back now.
I will see you again later.
But before that, I should probably make sure they do not fight again after I leave.
What the hell happened to your pants, man?
I do not feel like fighting anymore.
Now I do not feel like slicing you up anymore.
I will not be held responsible for this now.
What were you going to do if something serious happened?
Like this jackass would go down that easily.
That is not the issue here!
They say the more you fight, the closer you are.
But make sure you do not fight too much, bah-ha.
Seriously, who do you think you are?
Your meat dish is not that bad, either.
Now, I will make you some dessert.
Hey, go get that one thing!
The more you fight, the closer you are, huh?
I-I do not mind f-fighting with you once in a while.
Well, I will be going now.
I am going to go join everyone else.
Let us call it a draw for today.
That makes it 53 wins, 0 losses, and 34 draws for me.
What the hell are you talking about?
You mean it is my 98 wins, 0 losses, and 1 draw.
It is my 156 wins and 0 losses.
I am the one with 567 victories here.
You want a piece of me?!
I have been wanting to settle the score with you for a long time now.
Come on, we are at this super fun festival, so let us not fight.
Let us just all get along, okay?'Kay?
We are going to become the biggest idols in the Clover Kingdom someday!
Idols that can sing, dance, and use magic!
We look forward to your support!
We look forward to plenty of yuls, too!
I bet you asked a girl out again just to get rejected.
I mean, that happened too, but...
A few other things happened, too.
Yami must have summoned you to use your spatial magic.
Captain Yami, I flew super far!
I need to get back to everyone else.
Is she from some wealthy family?
Hey, go talk to her, man.
I bet Finral would love her.
But I feel like I have seen her before.
Today, I will show you how to make some delicious grilled squid.
but you are not going to cheat and use magic like that one chef did, are you?
First, you pull out its insides and cut slits into it.
Then you season it with sugar, salt, mirin, and ginger.
Simple grilled squid that anyone can make.
There is no punchline this time.
Girls let their guard down a little, too!
Okay, I am going to get me a girl!
Black Clover, Page 69: The Briar Maiden's Melancholy.
She is even more beautiful than usual!
